text:
oh really?
I see it in all the pages I visited and though it was working fine already
I am actually seeing it fail sometimes but I think it’s consistent enough to roll with it and figure it out later
The check for if the element exists passes but then the menu doesn’t always get injected is the issue

The HubSpot Developer Extension v1.03 Beta has been released. <https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/releases/tag/v1.03-beta-3>

This beta is to test a few new pieces of functionality that the extension has. The Dark Theme has several significant updates, there’s a new Dev Nav feature which adds a dev menu to the HubSpot nav bar. We also made the extension support Spanish. Possibly the biggest change that could cause issues(though I haven’t noticed any). We’ve overhauled the permissions required by the extension to make them as minimal as possible - improving security and making people feel better.

Instructions for testing are in the ReadMe of the repo.

If you install the beta version please let us know if you run into any issues or have feedback! Thanks!
hoping to push v1.03 to everyone this week.
